ScriptAction.Script:
SetInventoryEnabled(true)
SetLocation("Forest Edge")

if not Storage.GetFlag("FOREST_COTTAGE_CHECKPOINT") then
    Storage.SetFlag("FOREST_COTTAGE_CHECKPOINT", true)
    SaveData.TakeCheckpoint()
end

AddLink(ECompass.West, function() BeginRoadTravel("Scene_RoadNorth") end)
AddLink(ECompass.East, "Scene_Forest")

Children.Title: Cottage
Children.Tooltip: Step inside.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Turn back while you still can.

Children.Title: Knock
Children.Tooltip: The polite way.

ScriptAction.Script:
-- no answer
Log("forest_cottage_knock1")
Sleep(3)
Log("forest_cottage_knock2")
Sleep(3)
Log("forest_cottage_knock3")

Children.Title: Enter
Children.Tooltip: Just open the door and step in.

ScriptAction.Script:
Storage.SetFlag("FOREST_COTTAGE_ENTRY_FIRST", true)
Storage.SetFlag("MQ02_ROAD_ANTAG_SCHEDULED", true)
Storage.SetNumber("OLIVER_MOOD", 0)
LogSplit()
Player:AwardXP(RewardXP.DiscoveryMinor)
Log("mq02_cot_entry")
SetLocation("Cottage")

Children.Title: Check
Children.Tooltip: [Wits] Try and see what's wrong with him.

Children.Title: Slap
Children.Tooltip: Give his face a good slap.

Children.Title: Sympathetic
Children.Tooltip: Tell him your name, and that he's safe.

Children.Title: Open
Children.Tooltip: Say that you're here to get supplies for the bridge.

Children.Title: Wolf
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the big wolf. What did he look like?

Children.Title: Prey
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the stomach and the live prey.

Children.Title: Reason
Children.Tooltip: Ask about why they were there.

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Ask him what happened next.

Children.Title: Comfort
Children.Tooltip: Maybe he wants a hug?

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("MQ02_OLIVER_R_END2")

-- Quite a big scene just happened
AdvanceTime(1)

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Time to go.

Children.Title: Vengeful
Children.Tooltip: Tell him you'll get to the bottom of this.

Children.Title: Cautious
Children.Tooltip: Say that you want to know what the hell happened here.

Children.Title: Concerned
Children.Tooltip: Ask about his injuries specifically. Who did that?

ScriptAppear.Script:
-- shown if player noticed the injuries
return Storage.GetFlag("mq02_cot_wits")

Children.Title: Direct
Children.Tooltip: Ask him what the hell happened to him.

Children.Title: Calm
Children.Tooltip: Tell him to calm down; you're here to help.

Children.Title: Cold
Children.Tooltip: Tell him to man it up and stop wasting time.

ScriptAction.Script:
local state = Combat2()
state:AddParticipant(Player)
state:AddParticipant(Creature("CR_MQ02_Oliver"))
state:OnCreatureVored(function(predator, prey)
    Storage.SetFlag("oliver_eaten", true)
end)
state:OnCreatureKilled(function(predator, prey)
    Storage.SetFlag("oliver_dead", true)
end)
state:Begin()

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Look around the house, see if anything's worth taking.

Children.Title: Harsh
Children.Tooltip: Tell him to start talking right now.

Children.Title: Sober Up
Children.Tooltip: Splash some water from your canteen on his face.

Children.Title: Bandage
Children.Tooltip: Wrap some cloth around the claw marks.

ScriptAppear.Script:
-- shown if player noticed the injuries
return Storage.GetFlag("mq02_cot_wits")

Children.Title: Potion
Children.Tooltip: Pour one of your healing potions down his throat.

Children.Title: Carry
Children.Tooltip: [Strength] Pick him up and put him on the couch.

ScriptAction.Script:
SetInventoryEnabled(true)
SetLocation("Oliver's Cabin")

Storage.SetFlag("OLIVER_VISITED_MOOD" .. Storage.GetNumber("OLIVER_MOOD"), true)
LogSplit()
Log("OLIVER_COTTAGE_ENTER")
Log("OLIVER_GREET_MOOD" .. Storage.GetNumber("OLIVER_MOOD"))

Children.Title: Check up
Children.Tooltip: Try to start a conversation.

ScriptAction.Script:
if Storage.GetFlag("MQ02_OLIVER_WAKE_POTION") then
    Log("OLIVER_TALK_CHECKUP_MQ02_POTION")
elseif Storage.GetFlag("MQ02_OLIVER_WAKE_BANDAGE") then
    Log("OLIVER_TALK_CHECKUP_MQ02_BANDAGES")
elseif Storage.GetFlag("MQ02_OLIVER_WAKE_ROUGH") then
    Log("OLIVER_TALK_CHECKUP_MQ02_ROUGH")
else
    Log("OLIVER_TALK_CHECKUP_MQ02_NEUTRAL")
end

Children.Title: Help
Children.Tooltip: Ask if there is something you can do to help.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("OLIVER_SQ03_START")
Storage.SetFlag("SQ03_STARTED", true)

-- Start SQ03: Add Oliver's tools to Pat's shop
local shop = Shop("PortShop")
shop:AddUniqueItem(Item("I_SQ03_OliverSupplies"), 1)
shop:Save()
Journal.Update("SQ03", 10)

Children.Title: Give Tools
Children.Tooltip: You have the items he had asked for.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("OLIVER_SQ03_HANDIN")
Journal.Close("SQ03")

Player:TakeItem("I_SQ03_OliverSupplies")
Player:GiveItem("U_PotionHeal1", true)
Player:ModifyMoney(RewardGold.SQ03)
Player:AwardXP(RewardXP.SQ03_HandIn)

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Thank him.

Children.Title: Talk
Children.Tooltip: Strike up a conversation about something.

Children.Title: Absence
Children.Tooltip: Ask where he was when you came by earlier.

Children.Title: Mayor Iso
Children.Tooltip: Ask what he knows about the missing mayor.

Children.Title: Loneliness
Children.Tooltip: Ask if he doesn't feel isolated in this cabin, away from the town.

Children.Title: Randall
Children.Tooltip: Ask if he's seen the predatory black wolf again.

Children.Title: Stip
Children.Tooltip: Ask about his relationship with the late Stip.

Children.Title: Promise
Children.Tooltip: Promise to make Randall pay.

Children.Title: Avoid
Children.Tooltip: Promise to try.

Children.Title: Work
Children.Tooltip: Ask if he keeps busy enough with work.
